committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to commend the United States Jaycees, the St. Albans Jaycees, and Deere and Company for their participation in the Outstanding Young Farmer Program.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to commend the United States Jaycees, the Saint Albans Jaycees, and Deere and Company, for their part in recognizing the outstanding contributions of the young American farmer to the greatness of the United States through the young farmer program.

titles.title: A joint resolution to commend the United States Jaycees, the St. Albans Jaycees, and Deere and Company for their participation in the Outstanding Young Farmer Program.
